name: Higher-Order Component (HOC) Pattern
description: A function that takes a component and returns a new component with additional props or behavior
when_to_use: Cross-cutting concerns, component reuse, adding functionality without modifying original component
benefits: Code reuse, separation of concerns, composability
drawbacks: Wrapper hell, prop collision issues, complexity in debugging
use_cases: Authentication, logging, data fetching, styling, error boundaries
